attributes.action: Ensure that British Telecom automatically charge if a Direct Debit system is not used for Bill Payment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BT have started to enforce a charge of £1.50 without discretion if the bill is not payed through the clearing banks Direct Debit system.
I can understand if a discount was offered by using Direct Debits - but charging more if it is not is a breach of civil liberties.
Yet another form of Indirect Taxation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
